entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
